content.body: Hmm, why this lowercases charset: (new Response(new Blob(["data"]), {headers: [["Content-Type", "text/plain;charset=UTF-8"]]})).blob().then((b)=> { console.log(b.type); });
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Hmm, why this lowercases charset: (new Response(new Blob(["data"]), {headers: [["Content-Type", "text/plain;charset=UTF-8"]]})).blob().then((b)=> { console.log(b.type); });

content.body: Blob constructor does convert type to lowercase, but fetch spec doesn't use that constructor
